snippet.title: Monster Hunter Stories 2 - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Announcing Monster Hunter Stories 2, a story-driven RPG set in the world of Monster Hunter.

#MHStories2 is coming to Nintendo Switch in Summer 2021.

---
Japanese https://youtu.be/Rw-sxSH1CUY
French https://youtu.be/TLkDxmu9NkM
Italian https://youtu.be/6kftq0BLHxk

Spanish https://youtu.be/vwGDAidLjUU
Russian https://youtu.be/8Vda_4D28T0
Polish https://youtu.be/yj0JsBQEpwM
Brazilian Portuguese https://youtu.be/mO68wmZ35fo

Simplified Chinese https://youtu.be/PYHpEffhPLo
